contest-event.event-date:
May 28, 1977 D Around the Towns Contest
Around the Towns Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
around-the-towns-contest
None
Chard (Cornhill), Crewkerne (Precinct), Stoke (The Plot), Yeovil (St John's Church Yard) Promoted by South Somerset Brass
Each band played an entertainments programme in each town. The adjudicators' results from each venue were brought to the final massed bands concert in the evening, where the results were tallied.
Oct. 19, 2012, 3 p.m. Jan. 8, 2013, 8:43 p.m.
1 Glastonbury Brass Ray Hunt
Unknown Result Chard Concert Brass Unknown
Unknown Result Crewkerne Town Band David Hooper
Unknown Result Stoke-sub-Hamdon William Aird
